data.lyric:
[ti:Hate Me]
[ar:Ellie Goulding/Juice WRLD]
[al:Hate Me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Hate Me - Ellie Goulding/Juice WRLD
[00:00.25]Lyrics by：Jason Evigan/Ellie Goulding/Brittany "Starrah" Hazzard/Jordan K. Johnson/Stefan Johnson/Marcus Lomax/Andrew Wotman/Jarad "Juice WRLD" Higgins
[00:00.51]Composed by：Jason Evigan/Ellie Goulding/Brittany "Starrah" Hazzard/Jordan K. Johnson/Stefan Johnson/Marcus Lomax/Andrew Wotman/Jarad "Juice WRLD" Higgins
[00:00.77]Hate me hate me still tryna replace me
[00:03.94]Chase me chase me tell me how you hate me
[00:06.72]Erase me 'rase me wish you never dated me
[00:09.86]Lies tell me lies baby tell me how you hate me
[00:13.25]I bet you don't kiss her with your eyes closed
[00:16.29]I bet you're still walkin' on a tightrope
[00:19.46]Miss me so much you've been goin' psycho
[00:22.64]You ain't gotta say it baby I know
[00:27.28]It's a thin line between all this love and hate
[00:30.14]And if you switch sides you're gon' have to claim your place
[00:33.37]So baby this time you're gon' have to seal your fate
[00:36.43]Yeah baby this time you're gon' have to seal your fate
[00:39.61]And tell me how you hate me hate me still tryna replace me
[00:43.51]Chase me chase me tell me how you hate me
[00:46.61]Erase me 'rase me wish you never dated me
[00:49.83]Lies tell me lies baby tell me how you hate me
[00:53.17]Hate me hate me still tryna replace me
[00:56.24]Chase me chase me tell me how you hate me
[00:59.40]Erase me 'rase me wish you never dated me
[01:02.63]Lies tell me lies baby tell me how you hate me
[01:05.91]Hate me hate me tell me how you hate me
[01:09.13]Tell me how I'm trash and you could easily replace me
[01:12.31]Tell me that I'm strung out wasted on the daily
[01:15.47]Prolly 'cause there's no one around me numbin' all my pain
[01:18.61]Prolly 'cause there's no umbrella to shield me from all the rain
[01:21.53]Probably because you're the one playin' the mind games
[01:24.82]You hate me because I don't let you play no mind games
[01:28.35]They give me migraines and damage my brain
[01:31.50]Date me break me easily replace me
[01:35.12]Hopefully you see it clear hopefully it's HD
[01:37.90]Bet you wonder why the last few months I've been spacey
[01:41.13]In your head I sing
[01:43.40]And tell me how you hate me hate me still tryna replace me
[01:47.42]Chase me chase me tell me how you hate me
[01:50.59]Erase me 'rase me wish you never dated me
[01:53.85]Lies tell me lies baby tell me how you hate me
[01:57.08]Hate me hate me still tryna replace me
[02:00.22]Chase me chase me tell me how you hate me
[02:03.36]Erase me 'rase me wish you never dated me
[02:06.65]Lies tell me lies baby tell me how you hate me
[02:09.85]It's a thin line between all this love and hate
[02:12.50]Okay
[02:12.57]And if you switch sides you're gon' have to claim your place
[02:15.63]Okay
[02:15.77]So baby this time you're gon' have to seal your fate
[02:18.57]Okay
[02:18.98]Yeah baby this time you're gon' have to seal your fate
[02:21.81]Okay
[02:21.98]And tell me how you hate me hate me still tryna replace me
[02:25.82]Chase me chase me tell me how you hate me
[02:28.99]Erase me 'rase me wish you never dated me
[02:32.20]Lies tell me lies baby tell me how you hate me
[02:35.11]Tell me how you hate me hate me still tryna replace me
[02:38.58]Chase me chase me tell me how you hate me
[02:41.81]Erase me 'rase me wish you never dated me
[02:45.06]Lies tell me lies baby tell me how you hate me
[02:50.10]Tell me how you hate me
[02:51.87]Lies tell me lies tell me how you hate me
[02:56.21]Tell me how you hate me
[02:57.93]Lies tell me lies baby tell me how you hate me
data.trans:
[ti:Hate Me]
[ar:Ellie Goulding/Juice WRLD]
[al:Hate Me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.25]//
[00:00.51]//
[00:00.77]你说你讨厌我 还要换个新女朋友
[00:03.94]明明是你追求的我 却又说你恨透了我
[00:06.72]你要彻底忘掉我 你后悔当初和我约会
[00:09.86]你满嘴谎言 宝贝 你总说你恨透了我
[00:13.25]我敢肯定你吻她的时候不敢闭眼
[00:16.29]我敢肯定你还是小心翼翼 如履薄冰
[00:19.46]思念成魔 就快把你逼疯了
[00:22.64]什么都不用说了 宝贝 我都懂
[00:27.28]爱与恨只在一念之间
[00:30.14]要是你变了心 就必须对我明说
[00:33.37]所以宝贝 这一次你必须面对现实了
[00:36.43]宝贝 这一次你必须面对现实了
[00:39.61]你说你讨厌我 还要换个新女朋友
[00:43.51]明明是你追求的我 却又说你恨透了我
[00:46.61]你要彻底忘掉我 你后悔当初和我约会
[00:49.83]你满嘴谎言 宝贝 你总说你恨透了我
[00:53.17]你说你讨厌我 还要换个新女朋友
[00:56.24]明明是你追求的我 却又说你恨透了我
[00:59.40]你要彻底忘掉我 你后悔当初和我约会
[01:02.63]你满嘴谎言 宝贝 你总说你恨透了我
[01:05.91]恨我 恨我 你说你恨透了我
[01:09.13]你把我贬得一无是处 你说换掉我是件轻而易举的事
[01:12.31]你说我无可救药 每天都在虚度光阴
[01:15.47]也许是因为没有人在我身边 帮我缓解痛苦
[01:18.61]也许是因为没有人为我撑伞挡雨
[01:21.53]也许是因为你在和我打一场心理战
[01:24.82]你怨恨我 因为我没有应战
[01:28.35]这些事情让我头痛欲裂 脑子都快炸了
[01:31.50]你和我约会 伤害了我 轻而易举地把我换掉
[01:35.12]希望你可以清楚地看到 希望你能彻底地明白
[01:37.90]你肯定想知道为什么最近几个月我一直萦绕在
[01:41.13]你的脑海中 我唱着
[01:43.40]你说你讨厌我 还要换个新女朋友
[01:47.42]明明是你追求的我 却又说你恨透了我
[01:50.59]你要彻底忘掉我 你后悔当初和我约会
[01:53.85]你满嘴谎言 宝贝 你总说你恨透了我
[01:57.08]你说你讨厌我 还要换个新女朋友
[02:00.22]明明是你追求的我 却又说你恨透了我
[02:03.36]你要彻底忘掉我 你后悔当初和我约会
[02:06.65]你满嘴谎言 宝贝 你总说你恨透了我
[02:09.85]爱与恨只在一念之间
[02:12.50]好吧
[02:12.57]要是你变了心 就必须对我明说
[02:15.63]好吧
[02:15.77]所以宝贝 这一次你必须面对现实了
[02:18.57]好吧
[02:18.98]宝贝 这一次你必须面对现实了
[02:21.81]好吧
